FuncDef:
The info-center loghost source-port command configures a source interface through which the device sends information to the log host.
The undo info-center loghost source-port command deletes the configuration of the source interface through which the device sends information to the log host.
By default, the source interface number is 38514.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of the source interface through which the device sends information to the log host.
The value is an integer ranging from 1025 to 65535.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To harden system security, run the info-center loghost source-port  command to change the number of the source interface through which the device sends information to the log host.
